description: Come learn how you can join Waterlooâ€™s synthetic biology design team from our team leads! Due to COVID-19, the session will be held online. See our Facebook event for more information.
Applications for all subteams open only once per year! Follow our social media for updates.
No late applications will be considered, so make sure you submit your application on time!
Interviewees will be contacted shortly after applications close.
All applicants will receive a response from us in February.
The Wiki Design Team creates the project wiki. It consists of web developers and a UI/UX designer.
No late applications will be considered, so make sure you submit your application on time!
Interviewees will be contacted shortly after applications close.
All applicants will receive a response from us mid-June.
